name: classes
description: Classes to add to the container.

name: element
description: HTML element to replace the default 'div' element.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the container.

name: clickable
description: If set, entire card will be clickable

name: type
description: If set, this will alter the appearance of the card

name: heading
description: If set, entire card will be wrapped in a link

params.name: title
params.description: The title of the card heading

params.name: href
params.description: If set, the heading will contain a link

params.name: headingLevel
params.description: Sets the heading level - if omitted will default to H2

name: content
description: If set, card body will display this value

params.name: text
params.description: If present, the value of this attribute will be displayed in a paragraph tag

params.name: html
params.description: If present, the value of this attribute will be displayed within the card as HTML

name: image
description: If a URL referencing an image is supplied, an image will be used in the card

params.name: src
params.description: Provide a relative or absolute URL for the image

params.name: alt
params.description: Provide a text description of the image

name: topBorder
description: If set, the card will receive a decorative border on the top of the card
